item.title: Bootcamp Sessions on www.cannibalradio.com DJ Viper Don June 23rd 2011
item.description: Bootcamp Sessions Live in Greece in the Cannibal Radio studio's in Athens Your host DJ Viper Don Jungle,Danchall,Drum and Bass Vibes www.cannibalradio.com Every other Thursday 20.00 to 22.00hrs Greek time Facebook : DJ Viper Bootcamp & BootCamp Mindeye Myspace.com/mrviperdon Email : djviperdon@hotmail.com

item.itunes:summary:

item.title: BootCamp Sessions Pt2 June 2011
item.description: BootCamp Session Mixed by DJ Viper Don Producers & Vocalist in Mix: 1.Hardcore Youth vs I-Cue : Listen to The sound EP, 2.DJ Quest : SolidVinyl, 3.DubForce : LionDub International, 4.Invisible Landscape : Unsigned, 5.Higher sense : Moving Shadow, 6.MindMapper & SilvahFonk, 7.SLY Pacso Ft David Boomah, 8.DJ Quest : Solid vinyl, 9.Marcus Visionary Ft Johny Osbourne : LionDub International : Humble EP, 10.DJ Quest & Flying Doctor C : Solid Vinyl, 11.Noah D FT Navigator : Liondub International, 12.Dream Water - Life Style, 13.DJ Quest : Solid Vinyl, 14.Higher Sense : Moving Shadow, 15.Insom : Unsigned, 16.Stereo Type : Nex Gen, 17.FlyTronic : Moving Shadow, 18.Dangerous Dave : Unsigned, 19.RTC ft Blackout JA & Lady MC : RunTings Recordings, 20.Bonus Dancehall mix : D.N.A Riddim mixed by Viper Don Facebook : DJViper Bootcamp, Myspace.com/mrviperdon, mindeye@hotmail.co.uk

item.title: Bootcamp Sessions Pt1 June 2011
item.description: New for 2010 Bootcamp sessions Mixed By DJ Viper Don Bringing you the latest in Danchall Jungle to your speakers with new Tracks from Marcus Visionary,LionDub,DJ Quest,Demolition Man, Terry T,Jamma, I-Cue,Mightyl Mystic and to finish off with some Reggea classics Labels included : Liondub International,Solid Vinyl Facebook : DJViper Bootcamp : Myspace/mrviperdon: Skype : viperdon
item.dc:creator: VIPER
item.itunes:summary:
New for 2010 Bootcamp sessions Mixed By DJ Viper Don
Bringing you the latest in Danchall Jungle to your speakers
with new Tracks from Marcus Visionary,LionDub,DJ Quest,Demolition Man, Terry T,Jamma, I-Cue,Mightyl Mystic and to finish off with some Reggea classics
Labels included : Liondub International,Solid Vinyl
Facebook : DJViper Bootcamp : Myspace/mrviperdon: Skype : viperdon
